title: YouTube
text: The official video sharing platform. Search for videos, channels, and more.

title: Facebook
text: Connect with friends and the world around you on Facebook.

title: Wikipedia
text: A free online encyclopedia with articles on virtually every topic.

title: Google
text: The world's most popular search engine.

title: Twitter
text: A social networking service where users post and interact with messages known as tweets.

title: Instagram
text: A photo and video sharing social networking service.

title: LinkedIn
text: A professional networking site to connect with colleagues and find job opportunities.

title: Reddit
text: A network of communities based on people's interests.

title: Amazon
text: An online shopping platform for a wide variety of products.

title: Netflix
text: A streaming service for movies and TV shows.

title: Pinterest
text: A visual discovery engine for finding ideas like recipes, home and style inspiration, and more.

title: Quora
text: A platform to ask questions and connect with people who contribute unique insights and quality answers.

title: Yahoo
text: A web services provider offering search, news, email, and more.

title: Bing
text: A search engine from Microsoft.

title: eBay
text: An online auction and shopping website.

title: Tumblr
text: A microblogging and social networking website.

title: Flickr
text: An image and video hosting service.

title: Dropbox
text: A file hosting service that offers cloud storage and file synchronization.

title: SoundCloud
text: An online audio distribution platform and music sharing website.

title: Spotify
text: A digital music service that gives you access to millions of songs.
